mapper.insert: INSERT INTO raffle(specialCase, url, productId, raffleType, releasePrice, imgSrc, storeName, country, delivery, payType, startDate, startTime, endDate, endTime, content) VALUES (#{specialCase}, #{url}, #{productId}, #{raffleType}, #{releasePrice}, #{imgSrc}, #{storeName}, #{country}, #{delivery}, #{payType}, #{startDate}, #{startTime}, #{endDate}, #{endTime}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM raffle AS r JOIN product AS p ON p.id = r.productId where r.id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE raffle SET url=#{url}, raffleType=#{raffleType}, releasePrice=#{releasePrice}, storeName=#{storeName}, country=#{country}, delivery=#{delivery}, payType=#{payType}, startDate=#{startDate}, startTime=#{startTime}, endDate=#{endDate}, endTime=#{endTime}, content=#{content}, specialCase=#{specialCase}, imgSrc=#{imgSrc}, model_kr=#{model_kr} WHERE id=#{id}
